income_messages:
From: h**********b@gmail.com
To: CRAWLER
Time: 2023-04-20 16:25:40
SUBJECT:  Dear   
 Dear   
We are pleased to inform you that your total payment entitlement has been cleared and approved to be released to you finally through our foreign payment center in Japan. Consequently, You are expected to travel to this payment center to formalize and finalize the process of this fund's payments release to you.
Firstly, You will be traveling to Canada to sign the relevant payment release documents, which you will travel with to present to the paying officials in Japan for the eventual release of your payment and subsequent transfer of your entire funds to your designated Bank account.
Furthermore, to enable this process to achieve its full objective, Our Sponsor will buy some gift items capable of enticing our other officials at the payment/transfer center in Japan. You will carry these gift items and the signed documents with you to Japan to present to the officials there as tips in order to compel them to ascribe to your payment all priority attention it deserves. Of course, this singular action will ensure that not only you receive your payment certainly but also first before any other beneficiary.
A capable Sponsor has been contacted to assist us with the provision of all the necessary financial assistance by paying for your tickets throughout this journey, your hotel accommodation both in Canada and Japan.  You shall also be given some money to serve as your feeding and other expenses once you arrive in Canada.
PLEASE NOTE THAT YOU ARE NOT GOING TO ADVANCE OR PAY ANY MONEY UPFRONT ALL THROUGH THIS EXERCISE. Your only contribution is to accept travel and all your travel expenses shall be taken care of by us. Secondly, accept to sign the documents in Canada and travel with the same documents and the purchased gift items to Japan for the final endorsement and transfer of your payment. Also note that the money for the purchase of these gift items shall be borne by us and handled by our Sponsor in question.
The entire journey will take you between 6 to 7 days to conclude. Therefore, you should prepare yourself for this number of days.
Finally, should you accept to make this trip, I urge you to contact your local traveling agency to inquire if you need a VISA to travel to these countries, so that you can apply for it immediately to save time.
Kindly send a copy of your passport and name of your airport to commence booking of your ticket and hotel reservation.
Do not hesitate to ask me questions if need be.
Best regards,
Dr. John Goodman.
Director foreign affairs,
International monitoring fund.(IMF).
London,UK.    
From: h**********b@gmail.com
To: gq60002@l******s.email
Time: 2023-04-24 09:20:15
SUBJECT: Re: My reply.
Attention: Stephen.
Sir,
Thanks for your email dated 23rd April with all the contents well noted,
Since you are keen to make the trip, Send the name of your airport and a
copy of your passport in order to book your ticket and hotel reservation.
Note the gift items you are carrying Japan is male and female cloth which
you will present to the bank officials in Japan to facilitate the release
of your payment on your arrival in Japan.The cost of the gift items is not
known at the moment because the sponsor have not purchase it yet.
The name of the bank you will receive your payment is : MIZUHO BANK
JAPAN.There is no specific date for you to travel but You have to make
every arrangement to travel on or before the end of this month.You should
indicate the date you will like to travel this month so as to book your
ticket on your preferred date of departure.
Feel free to call me on my whats-app number for more details:
+447700304589.Also send your whats-app number for easy communication.
Waiting for your valued response.
Yours Sincerely,
Dr. John Goodman.

Note your whats-app phone number is needed for easy communication.

Ginab.
